scripts.clean: rm -rf .turbo && rm -rf node_modules && pnpm --recursive --filter "./packages/*" exec rm -rf dist && pnpm --recursive --filter "./packages/*" exec rm -rf .turbo && pnpm --recursive --filter "./packages/*" exec rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && pnpm --recursive --filter "./apps/*" exec rm -rf dist && pnpm --recursive --filter "./apps/*" exec rm -rf .turbo && pnpm --recursive --filter "./apps/*" exec rm -rf tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.build: pnpm --recursive --filter "./packages/*" run build && pnpm --recursive --parallel --filter "./apps/*" run build
